name: Army Sniper Assault Shooting
description:
With all those shooting sniper games in the market, we bring to your Army Sniper 2018 sniper shooting game. Get this FPS shooting experience with sniper rifle as military duty begins in army sniper war game. You’ve already experienced many sniper shooting games, now is the time to play as the the real hero of army sniper. Army Sniper Assault Shooting will let you experience missions where the ultimate task is the need to fight against the enemy terrorist in sniper army games.

Precise shooting will make this sniper game in city a thrilling. Create your own legacy as the best sniper shooter in the FPS army shooting game.

features:
Enjoy realistic gun simulation and animation
Amazing gameplay
Free to play
The natural sounds of fire and game music
Great graphics and environment
